attributes.action: Protect the identity of those accused of crimes
attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned, call on the government to stop the publication of the identities of people accused of crimes until their guilt is proven:

· Friendships and careers are ruined by such publications.

· Being branded a criminal before a fair trial is unjust and leaves the accused severely mentally distressed.

We urge the government to stop newspapers from this unjust "naming and shaming" and to implement a serious penalty for ignoring this directive.
